title: Interpretation of dreams about intercourse with a strange woman from the anus in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about intercourse with a strange woman from the anus in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about intercourse with a strange woman from the anus in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about touching a strange woman from the anus in a dream could be a sign of kindness or marriage, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself communicating with a strange woman From behind in a dream, this may indicate that he has reached a good position in his work, and God knows everything that he does not see. When you see a married man tying a strange woman from behind in a dream, this may be evidence of his reaching a high position, and God knows best. In the event that An unmarried young man saw himself having sex with a strange woman from behind in a dream. This may indicate achieving goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a black woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a black woman in a dream. Perhaps it means his distance from God, and God knows all that is unseen. If the dreamer sees himself He marries a black woman, as this may lead to dealing with the world, and God knows best. When a man sees a black woman getting married from behind, this may be a sign of judgment, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees a black woman marrying in a dream, perhaps it expresses his failure in his work, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees intercourse with her husband in Ramadan, this may be a sign of her straying from the straight path, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married man sees in a dream that he is having intercourse with his wife from behind, this may indicate the injustice that will befall her from him, and God knows all that he does not see. If the dreamer sees intercourse With his brother’s wife in a dream, it may express that he will suffer material losses, and God knows everything that no one has seen. When you see intercourse with your brother’s wife in a dream, it may express some unrighteous matters, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself having sex with his brother’s wife in a dream This may be a sign of revealing secrets, and God knows best. title: The meaning of seeing deception in a dream and the interpretation of seeing a deceiver

preview.html: Cheating is a bad trait that everyone hates, so seeing cheating in a dream is one of those visions that frighten the dreamer and exhaust his psyche when he wakes up, and this makes him search with great interest for its interpretation and meaning. Here in this article we will discuss with you the interpretation of a dream about cheating in a dream, detecting cheating in a dream, and interpreting Dreaming of someone cheating on me and cheating in a dream for single people in a dream. Details. Cheating in a dream. The dream interpretation of cheating in a dream suggests different meanings and interpretations, either for the cheater or the cheater in the dream. According to Ibn Sirin, the cheater in a dream is a symbol of the oppressed, and the cheater in a dream is a symbol of the victor. Therefore, seeing deception in a dream could be a symbol For victory and victory. Also, seeing deception in a dream indicates the presence of deceivers and hypocrites around the dreamer who want to harm him. It is possible that cheating in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will be exposed to a financial crisis and loss of money. It can symbolize problems, misfortunes, and problems that the dreamer may face in the coming period. There is another opinion that says that seeing deception in a dream is a reflection of the state of the fortuneteller who appears to be the opposite of what is hidden or appears to be the opposite of reality. As for seeing that he is being deceived in a dream by people he knows, this symbolizes the emergence of disagreements and conflicts in reality between him and his relatives or acquaintances. But if he was cheated by one of his family members, this symbolizes the fulfillment of a certain wish he desired. Therefore, seeing deception in a man’s dream indicates the presence of a treacherous friend or enemy near him who deceives him, conspires against him, and bestows upon him evil and hatred. If the deceitful person is a high-ranking person, This symbolizes a major financial problem. The interpretation of a dream about cheating in a dream indicates a problem with his wife. See also: Seeing lying in a dream. Interpreting seeing an alliance in a dream. Detecting deception in a dream. As for the interpretation of seeing deception in a dream, it may symbolize the strength of character that the dreamer has. It can To be a sign of the dreamer’s enjoyment of justice, his boldness in the truth, and his support for others in obtaining the truth and returning it to his family. Also, revealing deception in a dream for an unmarried woman is a symbol of her superior ability to solve problems and overcome the difficulties she faces in her life. As for seeing deception In a dream for a married woman, it symbolizes her ability to overcome the difficulties, tribulations, and problems she faces. Seeing a deceitful person in a dream. As for the interpretation of seeing a deceitful person in a dream, it symbolizes that the dreamer will be exposed to many misfortunes and problems around him. Seeing a deceitful person in an unmarried woman’s dream means The presence of people planning to disrupt her affairs. Likewise, seeing a deceitful person in a married woman’s dream is a sign of someone who conveys wrong words about her and causes her problems and misfortunes. Interpretation of a dream about a person who deceived me. For an interpretation of a dream about a person who deceived me in a dream, this symbolizes the tension and psychological pressure that the dreamer is experiencing At that moment. As for the interpretation of a dream about someone cheating on me in a married woman’s dream, if he is her husband, then it symbolizes the extent of love, respect, and friendship between her and her husband. And the interpretation of the dream for a person

title: Interpretation of a dream about a collapsed house

preview.html: Seeing a house collapsing expresses neglecting prayer, wasting obedience, committing sins, or the death of many parents. It may express an increase in the number of disputes and problems, and it may express forgetting memories and forgetting the painful past. Interpretation of a dream of an old house collapsing in a dream for a single woman. Watching an old house collapsing in a dream for a single woman indicates This girl wants to get rid of difficult memories. If an unmarried girl sees that she is working on demolishing the house herself, this means that she is getting rid of the problems and fears that she is experiencing. Seeing a destroyed house in a dream for an unmarried woman represents multiple sins and disobedience. Seeing a house falling in a dream for an unmarried woman Married and showing signs of sadness means that this girl needs a lot of stability. And calm. Seeing an old house collapsing in a dream for an unmarried woman represents the death of a family member or some of the parents. Read also: Interpretation of dreams to see the demolition of a house (house) in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dream about an old house collapsing in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees that she is demolishing an old house, she will be happy Thus, this indicates that she has left strife and marital problems. If a married woman dreams that her husband is demolishing her house, this is evidence of many sins and transgressions, and it may mean that she is earning money from forbidden sources or marital infidelity. Seeing the demolition of an old house in a married woman’s dream And her features express the intensity of her sadness, and this is evidence of multiple marital disputes and family problems. Seeing the demolition of a house in a married woman’s dream represents worries, problems, and marital distress. What is the interpretation of seeing a dream about an old house collapsing in a pregnant woman’s dream? If a pregnant woman sees that she is destroying an old house, then this A sign of many negative feelings that exist within her. Watching the construction of a collapsed house in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that there is a lot of good nutrition and abundance. An old house collapsing in a pregnant woman’s dream expresses anxiety and fear of childbirth. Seeing a dream of an old house collapsing in a dream for a pregnant woman It expresses anxiety and fear about the future and the responsibility that falls on her after giving birth. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing tall buildings in a dream about Nabulus, especially Interpretation of seeing a dream about an old house collapsing in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing a demolished house in a dream expresses that he cannot forget the memories of the past and that It is dominated by many negative emotions and feelings of sadness and pain. If you see a divorced woman working on building a broken house, this is a sign of her desire to change her life and remove her worries and anxieties. If a divorced woman finds that her old house is falling apart, this is a sign of her desire to get rid of her worries and problems and erase them from Memories of the pastContinue also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a house in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq - My Nazrati Magazine What is the interpretation of a dream about the collapse of an old house in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin: Watching repair work on an old house in a dream, especially for an unmarried young man, means that his marriage is approaching. And seeing Demolishing a house in a dream expresses that it removes...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing small feet in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: A mandala in a dream about Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq, may God have mercy on him, said: Seeing golden feet in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is affected by worries, sorrows, and worries, and God knows best. Small feet in a woman’s dream indicate her and her husband’s livelihood and good justice, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing gouache In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about silver legs for a single woman. Seeing aprons in a dream for an unmarried woman is news of the arrival of joys and happiness in her life. Interpretation of the vision of buying feet in a dream for an unmarried girl for kindness, livelihood, and abundance of money in the dreamer’s afterlife, and God knows best. Also, seeing aprons in a dream For an unmarried woman who is close to her marriage or engagement to someone who will do good for her. Small feet in a single woman’s dream may indicate the end of worries and problems and the beginning of a happy new life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a silver chain in a dream. Seeing small feet in a married woman’s dream. Seeing aprons In a married woman’s dream, it indicates the stability and security of her married life. Also, seeing a broken and broken bike in a married woman’s dream can indicate many problems and fears that she will face in her old life, and God knows best. If she sees a bike in her dream, this may indicate a good situation. For her situation, the end of her problems, and the stability of her life. Wearing leggings in a married woman’s dream portends a lot of good and upcoming sustenance in her and her husband’s life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing diamonds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about aprons for a pregnant woman. Seeing aprons in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the stability of her life and her good condition with Her husband, and God knows best. Seeing the husband giving his sleeping pregnant wife a bicycle could be good news for feeding a male child, and God knows what is in the wombs. Seeing aprons in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign that she will have an easy birth and good health for her and her fetus. Selling legs in a dream A pregnant woman is evidence that unpleasant things will happen to her, God forbid. See also: Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a ring in a dream. Interpretation of feet in a dream for a man. Seeing aprons in a man’s dream can be a sign of trouble and fatigue in his next life. This is reflected in buying legs in a young man’s dream, So it became clear to him that he would marry a beautiful girl, and God knows best. Seeing a man wearing leggings in his dream is a sign of the accumulation of debts in his life. And small feet. Gold in a dream. A person has unpleasant visions that may indicate trouble, illness, and the appearance of undesirable things, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about using legs for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a vision. A divorced woman wearing an apron in a dream is evidence that her good husband is repaying her for good. Seeing an apron in a divorced woman’s dream is considered one of the praiseworthy dreams and a sign of great sustenance and pleasure in this world. Seeing a woman wearing gold in a dream is good news about her transition to a new life. See also Interpretation of a dream about seeing a comb in a dream: A gift of a leg in a dream: Seeing a gift of a golden foot to someone in a dream indicates the love and strength of the relationship between them. The interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dream is:

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about someone visiting the house in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone visiting the house: When visitors come to our homes, most of us feel happy and joyful about it, especially if these are our favorite people, because we long to see them constantly, and many people see this vision in their dreams, and it is one of the dreams that carries many meanings and associations. This case will be explained in the following article. Interpretation of a dream about someone visiting the house If the dreamer sees in his dream an enemy visiting him in his home, this symbolizes that he will encounter many crises and obstacles in the coming days. If he sees one of his colleagues visiting him in his home in a dream, this indicates changes in His professional life. If a person sees in his dream that someone is visiting him at home, this means that many good things will happen in his life. Interpretation of a dream about someone visiting the house of Ibn Sirin. Many scholars, jurists, and dream interpreters talk about visions of people visiting in a dream, including Ibn Sirin. To know its interpretations, follow the following points with us: If the dreamer sees someone visiting him at home in his dream, this indicates the extent of love, familiarity, and friendship between them. Ibn Sirin interprets a person’s visit to the dreamer’s home to help him with something in a dream. This indicates that the same person will provide him with many services in reality. Interpretation of a dream about someone visiting a home for single people: Seeing an unmarried girl visiting someone with ugly features and unclean clothes in a dream, this indicates that God Almighty will grant her many blessings and benefits. Interpretation of dreams of entering the home of a person who does not I know him. If an unmarried woman sees someone she does not know visiting her house in a dream, this symbolizes that she will soon marry a well-known young man and travel with him. The interpretation of a dream of entering the house of someone I do not know for single people indicates that he will obtain a new job opportunity and this will be the first time he will work. In this field.Interpretation of a dream about someone visiting a home for a married woman. If a married woman sees someone visiting her home in a dream and welcomes him, this symbolizes how comfortable and secure she feels in her married life. Interpretation of a dream about a person visiting a married woman’s home shows that he possesses many good moral qualities, such as Generosity, loyalty and honesty, as it shows the extent of his attachment to his life partner. Seeing a married fortune teller visiting her house, eating with her and giving her some money in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions for her because she will soon receive a lot of good things. Interpretation of a dream about someone visiting the house for a pregnant woman. Dream interpretation indicates for a person Visiting a pregnant woman’s house indicates that God Almighty will give her a male child. Seeing a pregnant dreamer visiting her house in a dream indicates her sense of psychological peace and calm at this time. If a pregnant woman sees someone visiting her house and welcomes him and feels happy and prepares food for him in her dream, this means that she She will give birth naturally without feeling labor or fatigue. A pregnant woman seeing a dead person visiting her home and looking sad in her dream indicates that she is doing bad things that the deceased does not approve of, so she should pay attention and stop doing so.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a new apartment for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a new apartment for a married woman: Interpretation of a dream about a new apartment for a married woman is one of the interpretations that has aroused the interest of many interpretation scholars. We find that a married woman who sees a new apartment in a dream is evidence of the arrival of goodness and an increase in livelihood. We also find that it indicates that the married woman will become pregnant soon. When a married woman sees in a dream a new apartment with a sign related to the cleanliness of this apartment. This dream indicates the married woman’s repentance and freedom from sins. We also find that an interpretation of this dream has been given indicating that the married woman will get rid of the marital problems she faces, in addition to getting rid of anxiety. And stress. Interpretation scholars have reported that a married woman sees a new apartment in her dream. It is a good indicator that indicates that there will be many positive changes in the life of a married woman. In the event that a married woman sees an apartment that she really wanted to buy. This dream indicates an increase in her husband’s financial earnings in The coming period. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s new apartment. Interpretation of seeing a new, spacious apartment in a married woman’s dream. The interpretation of a married woman seeing a new apartment in a dream varies depending on the signs present within the dream. Interpretation scholars dealt with a married woman’s dream of a new apartment, noting that this apartment Spacious. This dream is considered a good indication that the married woman will get rid of all the problems and difficulties she faces. We also find that the vision of the apartment for the married woman was interpreted as evidence of this woman’s recovery and freedom from all health problems. Interpreters explained that the married woman sees a new, spacious apartment in The dream. It is a good vision that indicates that her husband will obtain a higher position in his work. If a married woman dreams of buying a new apartment, then this apartment is also characterized by being spacious. This dream shows the anxiety of the married woman and is also an indication of the presence of many obligations for that married woman When a married woman sees in a dream a new, spacious apartment. This vision is evidence of the stability of marital life and the elimination of all problems that exist between the married woman and her husband. Interpretation of seeing the apartment in a married woman’s dream. A married woman’s vision of an apartment is generally interpreted in the dream, as this vision indicates To changes in the life of a married woman. Interpretation scholars have indicated that seeing a new apartment in a married woman’s dream is a good indicator in general, and it also indicates the emergence of kindness and increased sustenance. When a married woman dreams that she is moving from her old home to a new home. This is evidence of The stability of her married life and her not being exposed to problems. If a married woman sees that she is decorating a new apartment in a dream, this indicates that there are many problems between her and her husband. The interpretation of this dream differs when a married woman sees that a new apartment is being built, as this vision indicates that the woman’s situation A married woman will change for the better. When a married woman sees in a dream that she is moving to a new apartment without her husband. This is a bad indicator that indicates the presence of a problem that will lead to...

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the right or left hand

preview.html: Seeing henna on a man’s left hand means that he will start a new job or a trip in the coming days, and seeing henna in a dream means happiness and abundance of goodness. Interpretation of seeing henna on the right or left hand in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is painting a lot of henna On her right hand in a dream, and its shapes are very beautiful in the dream. She stated that she will soon marry a good person for her. She loves him at this time and will live with him very happily, God willing. And seeing an unmarried woman in a dream trying to remove henna from her left hand in a dream, and she was upset The meaning here indicates that this single woman will face something bad in her life. She will try to get rid of it and then God Almighty will make her happy. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she painted henna on her left hand in a dream, and her appearance was very bad in the dream. And here The meaning shows that this single girl will strive for a lot of goodness at this time in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing henna in a dream according to major commentators. Interpretation of seeing henna on the right or left hand in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is drawing Henna is on her left hand, and it looks very beautiful in the dream, and she is happy about it. The dream indicates getting rid of all the marital problems that a married woman faces in her life. And they will live happily, God willing, in the coming periods. And if a married woman saw in a dream that she was looking at henna She wanted to draw it, but she could not in the dream and was sad. The meaning of this dream explains some of the bad things that a married woman goes through in her life. But with her closeness to God, she will get rid of all problems. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is looking for someone to help her draw henna on her Her right hand in a dream. Here it appears that they will get into trouble. She will ask for help from someone close to her in her life to free her from this matter. Interpretation of seeing henna on the right or left hand in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is drawing henna on her hands. She was very beautiful. And in many forms, and she was very happy with her in the dream. Here the meaning in the dream indicates that this divorced dreamer will see some good things. Something that will greatly improve her psychological state during this time. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream looking for henna to draw on her right hand. Or the left hand in a dream, and you did not find it in the dream. The meaning indicates that this divorced woman will face many crises in this period of her life. It will make her sad and disturb her a lot, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the divorced woman sees in her dream that someone she did not know before painted henna on her right and left hand in The dream, and I was happy with them. The dream here indicates that this divorced woman will marry someone suitable for her. She is very close to him and will be happy with him in her life, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the feet for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing henna on the right or left hand

The meaning of this dream explains some of the bad things that a married woman goes through in her life. But by being close to God, she will get rid of all the problems. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is looking for someone to help her draw henna on her right hand in a dream. It appears here that they will fall into trouble. She will ask for help from someone close to her in her life to free her from this matter. Interpretation of seeing henna on the right or left hand in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is drawing henna on her hands. It was very beautiful and in many forms, and she was very happy with it in the dream. Here the meaning in the dream indicates that this divorced dreamer will see some good things. Something that will greatly improve her psychological state during this time. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream looking for Henna drawn on her right or left hand in a dream, and she did not find it in the dream. The meaning indicates that this divorced woman will face many crises in this period of her life. It will sadden and disturb her a lot, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If the divorced woman sees in her dream that someone she did not know before drew henna on her right and left hands in the dream, and she was happy with them. The dream here indicates that this divorced woman will marry a suitable person for her. She is very close to her and she will be happy with him in her life, God willing. title: Interpretation of seeing dress details in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the details of a dress in a dream or a dream via the website roy2a.com. Seeing a made dress in a dream means a lot of goodness, fulfillment of desires, success and marriage for an unmarried girl. In this article we will explain seeing a detailed dress in a dream for an unmarried or married young man or woman, whether single or Married, pregnant, widowed, as well as divorced, with great explanations provided. Imams of interpretation of visions and dreams, such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, past and present, so follow us on the vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing the details of a dress in a dream? Ibn Sirin: Seeing the fitting of a dress in a dream portends good news and success. Seeing a long white dress in a dream indicates good news. Seeing details A long dress for a girl in a dream indicates purity, chastity, and obtaining what she wants. Seeing a black dress expresses many sorrows and worries. See also: Interpretation of seeing my friend wearing a white wedding dress in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an elaborate dress in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a long white dress in a dream for a woman Married: It indicates her marital happiness, joy and pleasure. Seeing a gift of a dress from a dead man in a dream for a married woman indicates comfort, tranquility, and safety from problems and worries. If a married woman sees that she is wearing a short dress, it indicates a failure in worship. Seeing an old dress indicates marital problems and problems. See many Dresses: It indicates luxury, stability and family happiness. See also: Interpretation of seeing a white or red dress according to the color of the dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dress made in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a new dress in a single woman’s dream It indicates the fulfillment of her desires in life and happy news. Seeing a blue dress in a dream A single woman indicates a girl’s marriage to a wealthy young man. Seeing a wedding dress in a dream for a single woman remembers her approach to marriage. If a single woman sees a pink dress, it indicates joy and happiness. What is the interpretation of seeing a detailed dress in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams of wearing a short dress, it indicates To the birth of a girl. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a long dress in a dream indicates the birth of a child. Seeing a black dress in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates troubled work. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream Interpretation of seeing a cut-off dress in a dream for a divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees that she is wearing a dress Long: It says that she hears happy news and achieves her goal in life. Seeing an old, clean dress in a dream for a divorced woman indicates her return to her ex-husband. If a divorced woman sees a short dress, this indicates his failure in worship. Dreaming of a white dress in the final dream: she re-announces her marriage or hears happy news because it indicates Peace of mind and psychological peace. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wedding dress in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream as a gift: Seeing a gift of a dress in a dream for a married woman indicates love and understanding with the husband, happiness and stability. Seeing a dress as a gift in a dream for a young man indicates the approach of his marriage. What is the interpretation of a dream about wearing Long dress for a single woman: see a long dress

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a contract

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about buying a necklace in different situations. Seeing a necklace in a dream is one of the visions that many people see and they are very happy, especially if the dreamer is a woman, as the necklace is considered one of the most important adornments for women, but what about the interpretation of this vision and does it bring goodness or does it bring a vow? Bad and she must be warned, and the interpretation of seeing buying a necklace in a dream varies depending on whether the fortuneteller is a man or not. One woman or girl or what? This is what we will learn in detail through this article in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing a necklace in a dream: Dream interpretation lawyers say that if someone sees in a dream that he is wearing a gold necklace, this means that this person will obtain an important position. But if one sees that he is buying a necklace Made of iron, this indicates great strength and courage, but if one sees that he bought a pearl necklace, this indicates that the dreamer will gain great status, and this vision indicates achieving goals. And the ambitions that a person aims to achieve in his life. Whoever sees in his dream that his necklace is broken, this indicates the banishment of the ruler, but if he sees that he is buying a pearl necklace, this means memorizing the Holy Qur’an, but if a person sees in his dream that. He has many contracts and this indicates that he will face many problems in his life. Interpretation of seeing buying a necklace in an unmarried girl’s dream: Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a necklace on her chest, this means that she will marry a man in A great position, but if she sees that she took off the necklace, this indicates that. She has a strong and imposing personality on others. If she sees that her contract has been canceled, this indicates that she will face many problems in her love life or that her engagement will end. However, if she sees that someone is buying her the necklace as a gift, this indicates that she will get married. A romantic person and she lives with him very happily. Interpretation of seeing buying a necklace in a married woman’s dream: Dream interpretation scholars say that if a married woman sees in her dream that she is buying a necklace and bragging about it in front of people, this means that her husband loves her and is very happy with her. But if a married woman sees If she buys a pearl necklace, this means that she suffers from magic and envy, and if she sees that she is buying a gold necklace, this indicates that she will suffer from many problems in her life with it. Her husband.Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman buying a necklace in a dream: Dream interpretation lawyers say that seeing a pregnant woman buying a necklace in a dream means that she will give birth easily.To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.
